text: Oiva Kalervo Toikka (29 May 1931 â€“ 22 April 2019) was a Finnish glass designer. He designed for Iittala. He was best known for his bird designs for Iittala. He trained in ceramics at the University of Art and Design in Helsinki. He also worked as a stage and costume designer. He designed textiles for Marimekko. Toikka was born in Viipuri. He died on 22 April 2019, at the age of 87. ==References== ==Other websites== * Oiva Toikka at Iittala.com Category:1931 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Finnish designers
